preferences.comments: Looking around North Chennai. Wants clarity on location. Project under construction, interested if within budget.
Interested but will buy in 6 months to 1 year. Already visited the location. Project is under construction.
Not interested in flats or general investments. Wants local land to build a house.
Interested in DTCP plots. Emphasized location near highway and stadium. Prefers no middlemen. Likes potential for quick ROI.
Confused about road connectivity (ECR, NH-51). Wants clarity on access. DTCP plots and long-term potential.
